entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
